content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Cluster at positions (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1, 1) with fuel (coal) and input (iron-ore)
- Stone furnace at position (3, 0) with fuel (coal) and input (iron-ore)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have enough space and resources to accept the items being inserted. Check the inventory of the furnaces before inserting.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items from the furnaces only when they have finished processing. Check the status of the furnaces to avoid unnecessary extraction attempts.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check the surrounding area for existing entities.
